title: Solana taps Filecoin for enhanced decentralized data storage and access
description: Solana teams up with Filecoin to boost scalability, making data Solana's block history more accessible to various blockchain actors.

title: NFT Market Sales Dip 12% This Week While Highlight Collections Record Notable Rises
description: In the last week, the market for non-fungible tokens (NFTs) has seen a decline, with sales falling 12.67% compared to the previous week, totaling $255.22 million. Ethereum took the lead in NFT sales, raking in $133 million, while Solana followed with sales over $46 million, relegating Bitcoin to third place with $40.9 million in sales. […]

title: A New AI-Driven Platform Approaches Learning and Health Differently
description: Discover how the new AI-driven platform Ascend is revolutionizing personalized learning, health management, and edutainment.

title: CoinShares’ Meltem Demirors Says Ethereum (ETH) Narrative Has Struggled Amid Rise of Rival Layer-1s
description:
The chief strategy officer of market intelligence platform CoinShares says that the narrative centered around Ethereum (ETH) has been hampered amid the rise of alternative layer-1 blockchains. In a new interview on the Crypto Banter YouTube channel, CoinShares CSO Meltem Demirors says that crypto newcomers are still more likely to choose Bitcoin (BTC) over Ethereum […]

The post CoinShares’ Meltem Demirors Says Ethereum (ETH) Narrative Has Struggled Amid Rise of Rival Layer-1s appeared first on The Daily Hodl.
